content: this pattern is to make worry monsters they have a shallow mouth and are for little ones to write their worries down and feed them to the monster this pattern is written in us terminology and has several pictures to guide you there is no particular gauge required as long as consistent throughout i used stylecraft classique cotton dk and i used a 50g ball for the body and small amounts of the other colours you will need a stitch marker as this is made in the round tapestry needle and toy stuffing the pattern is not to be distributed i am happy for items made from this pattern to be sold as long as credit is given for my design
